oracle.pg.hbase

Class HBaseIndexManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.text.OracleIndexManager
      • oracle.pg.hbase.HBaseIndexManager

  • public class HBaseIndexManager
extends OracleIndexManager
    A single point for accessing all vertex and edge indices of a specific OraclePropertyGraph object.

      • Fields inherited from class oracle.pg.text.OracleIndexManager
